title: New: Life is Better Blonde – Fires
body:
There’s a real James Blake head nod on this latest track from Melbourne’s **Life is Better Blonde**.

_Fires_ is a glitchy, slickly produced number, sitting somewhere between the uncompromising yet addictive electronica of Blake’s early releases, and the smoother, more straight forward second album from 4AD’s SOHN. Check it out below.

excerpt.full: There’s a real James Blake head nod on this latest track from Melbourne’s Life is Better Blonde. Fires is a glitchy, slickly produced number, sitting somewhere between the uncompromising yet addictive electronica of Blake’s early releases, and the smoother, more straight forward second album from 4AD’s SOHN. Check it out below.
